Gordon (ubochí ato n'ọnwa Julaị 1936 rụo ọnwa Nọvemba 2013) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ.  Ọ kwagara Montreal n'afọ 1973 ebe ọ bụ prọfesọ nleta mgbè ahụ ónyé otu ngalaba na Mahadum Concordia rụo mgbè ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 1998.
A mụrụ Gordon na Philadelphia n'afọ 1936
Ọ natara BFA na Mahadum Temple na 1962, MS na Mahadụ Wisconsin na 1966 na MFA na Machị Wisconsin na 1967.

Ka Gordon malitere ọrụ kọleji ya, o mèrè atụmatụ ịmụ mgbakọ na mwepụ mgbe ọ na-egwu basketball na agụmakwụkwọ, mana o mechara gbanwee isi ya na nka tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ.   Gordon gbara bọọlụ bọọlụ n'ụzọ ọkachamara n'oge dị mkpirikpi tupu ọ lekwasị ányá n'ọrụ nka ya.

Gordon nwèrè ọtụtụ ọkwa na agụmakwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ gụnyere dị ka ónyé enyemaka Prọfesọ na Mahadum California-Berkeley (1969), osote Prọfesor na Mills College na Oakland, CA (197475), osote prọfesọ n' Mahadum Concordia, Montreal, Canada (1975), ónyé nkụzi nleta na San Francisco Art Institute (1969), na ọkwa na Mahadụ Saskatchewan, Saskatoon Canada (1984), Lakeside Studio, Michigan (1986, 1988) Mahadum East Carolina, North Carolina (1989).
A na-anọchite ányá ọrụ Gordon n'ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie na nchịkọta onwé ónyé
O nwere ihe na Smithsonian American Art Museum, Fine Arts Museum nke San Francisco, Musée national des beaux-arts du Québec na Block Museum of Art na Mahadum Northwestern.
